architectural_notes: Auth hooks (e.g., useBranchAuth) must be used within a BranchAuthProvider that wraps the app (e.g., in App root).
known_issues: Login screen renders as a white page when useBranchAuth is called without BranchAuthProvider wrapping the app (crash before render).

existing_features.title: Prevent the app from rendering a blank white page by ensuring all components that call useBranchAuth() are wrapped in BranchAuthProvider (e.g., wrap AppContent inside BranchAuthProvider in frontend/src/App.tsx).
